alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:08AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Monroe MO County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to Noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
